Name: Nitrogen
Desc: In target transportation stages, characters and targets transported will move faster.

Name: Dash
Desc: In Polar Soldier snow-dashing stages, Polar Soldiers will dash farther.

Name: Absorption
Desc: In stronghold occupancy stages, pull enemies within a big area at intervals.

Name: Agility
Desc: In the water park item-picking stages, characters' movement speed will increase.

Name: Kuroro
Desc: In stages of pursuing Kuroro, characters will gain a Self-Control button, which will cause area pull to Kuroro.

Name: Match 3 Games
Desc: In stages of identifying the same monsters, additional hints will be provided.

Name: High-Risk Operation
Desc: In High-risk Dark block, Area 4, Data Clusters will have less DMG Reduction.

Name: Bumper Car
Desc: In Polar-Soldier-crushing-monster stages, Polar Soldiers will gain Super Armor.

Name: Mole
Desc: In Musashi IX-pursuing-monster stages, movement speed will be increased.

Name: DMG Boost
Desc: Extra DMG Bonus of all characters increases by 30%.

Name: Rapid Speed
Desc: Characters' movement speed will increase in Cogs-picking stages.

Name: 360Â° Shooting
Desc: Character can cast Signature in Lee: Palefire's time-limited survival stages.

Name: Double Up
Desc: Increase the number of teammates in hide-n-seek stages.

Name: Kuroro
Desc: Kuroro's HP increases in flying Kuroro stages.

Name: Special Target
Desc: Alisa: Echo's shooting stages now have special enemies that provide special effects when taken down.

Name: Mole
Desc: In Musashi IX-pursuing-monster stages, movement speed will be increased.

Name: Nitrogen
Desc: In target transportation stages, characters and targets transported will move faster.

Name: Agility
Desc: Characters' movement speed will increase in time-limited item-picking stages.

Name: Ember Amplification
Desc: Increase all DMG by 2% for every 2% heat gained. During heat mode, gain an extra of 4 Energy for every Ping. Enter Matrix after casting Signature Move and gain 3 Blue Orbs.

Name: Pulse Amplification
Desc: Increase Overload DMG by 30% after casting Signature Move. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Reset if overload is interrupted. Overload mode activated after casting Signature Move extends by 4s. Enter Matrix after casting Signature Move and gain 3 Red Orbs.

Name: Crocotta Amplification
Desc: Discard all Signal Orbs when casting Signature Move. Each Orb deals an extra 10% DMG. When not in Frenzy Mode, gain 1 stack of Madness and 1 set of 3-Ping every 7s. When not in Frenzy Mode, gain 25 Energy and 1 set of 3-Ping every 7s.

Name: Pavo Amplification
Desc: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 40%. Gain 10 Energy when Enhanced Orb hits. Concentrated Orb-Ping costs 10 Sync Rate.

Name: Tempest Amplification
Desc: During a Signature Move, Staccato Orb DMG increases by 100%. After casting Signature Move, gain 1 set of 3-Ping. When casting Staccato Orbs during a Signature Move, there is a 40% chance to gain 1 Staccato Orb.

Name: Veritas Amplification
Desc: When in snipe mode, each arrow's Basic Attack DMG will be 20% higher than the last, can be stacked 6 times. It is reset when you exit snipe mode. 3-Ping DMG increases by 15%. When in snipe mode, gain a Red Orb 3-Ping every 4s. When in snipe mode, gain 1 set of red 3-Ping. 30% chance for sniper arrow to deal double DMG. Gain 1 Blue Orb.

Name: Garnet Amplification
Desc: Lightning Fall DMG increases by 100%. When using Lightning Fall, recover 10 Energy. Gain 1 random set of 3-Ping when casting Signature Move.

Name: Entropy Amplification
Desc: Shooting DMG dealt by Yellow Orb marker increases by 100%. Gain 3 Blue Orbs after pinging a Yellow Orb. Red Orb DMG increases by 50%. Gain 1 Red Orb after pinging a Blue Orb.

Name: Rigor Amplification
Desc: 3-Ping DMG increases by 100%. Unleash a wide-area electromagnetic beam to gain 50 Energy. Gain 1 random set of 3-Ping after casting Signature Move.

Name: Laurel Amplification
Desc: Annihilation Orb DMG increased by 100%. After entering Annihilation for 3s, there is a 40% chance to gain 1 Annihilation Orb for every Annihilation Orb pinged. Gain 2 random Signal Orbs after casting Signature Move.

Name: Tenebrion Amplification
Desc: Gain 12% Extra DMG Bonus for every 10% Energy gained in Dark Form. 1/2/3-Pings gain an extra 2/3/5 Energy. Gain 1 random Signal Orb when attacking. 3s cooldown.

Name: Crimson Abyss Amplification
Desc: When Swordwave lands a critical hit, CRIT DMG increases by 50%. Enter Matrix after casting Signature Move and gain 1 Blue Orb. CRIT Rate increases by 30% for 6s. Gain 4 Energy when pinging Swordwave Orbs.

Name: Plume Amplification
Desc: 40% chance to increase Signature Move DMG by 40% when casting Signature Move. Effect can be stacked up to 200% each battle. When switching to Physical Form, 3-Ping DMG increases by 30% for 7s and there is a 40% chance that the Passive Energy Gauge will be fully refilled. When switching to Ice Form, gain a random set of 3-Ping and there is a 40% chance to increase Signature Points by 1.

Name: Glory Amplification
Desc: In Frost Spirit Form, DMG increases by 50% for every 30-hit combo and stacks up to 200%. When leaving Frost Spirit Form, replenish the Glorious Shield by current combo count x0.5%. In Frost Spirit Form, deal 1 extra 30% Ice DMG that is included in the combo count when Basic Attack deals DMG.

Name: Toughened Plating
Desc: Gains 10s Super Armor upon a character entering the stage.

Name: Flash Speed
Desc: Character Dodge Gauge recovery rate increases.

Name: Speedy Siege 1
Desc: Unlocks Multi Challenge and increases challenge multiplier limit to 2.

Name: Calculated Reloading
Desc: Obtains 1 set of Signal Orbs every 10s.

Name: Explosive Blast
Desc: Every 5 3-Pings, the enemy explodes and suffers fixed DMG.

Name: Annihilating Duel
Desc: Increases the DMG of the deployed character by 1% every 1s, up to 30%. This effect is reset when receiving DMG.
